rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {PGC5008, PGC5108, PGC6008, VCG6021}
Must be enrolled in course version {2985, 3454}

description: This unit is a natural progression from PGC5008 and will allow students to further consolidate their research skills. Emphasis is on data analysis, drawing conclusions from the research, and development of the final research report. The final report will involve a verbal presentation of the entire project, and submission of a written report.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
